tool_description: Tests actual user permissions against specific resources and actions to verify role effectiveness.

resource_path.description: Path or identifier of the resource to test

action.description: Action to test: read, write, delete, execute, admin

error_messages: Invalid user identifier: User identifier must be a non-empty string.
System not accessible: Unable to connect to the specified system for testing.
Invalid resource path: Resource path is not valid for the target system.
Invalid action: Use one of [read, write, delete, execute, admin].
Invalid test mode: Use one of [simulation, actual_test, dry_run].
Permission test failed: Unable to complete permission test due to system error.
usage: Provide user_identifier, system_name, resource_path, and action to test. Set test_mode to control whether to perform simulation or actual testing.

access_granted.description: Whether access would be granted for the tested permission

permission_source.description: Which role or assignment granted the permission

test_details.description: Detailed explanation of the permission test result

response_time.description: Time taken to complete the permission test in milliseconds
